name: Camping Vacation Kids Games
description:
Does your kid love educational games and want to take part in a summer camp ?
If your child want to pitch a tent you have found the right educational game !
Let's go to enjoy summer camps !
Help the girl to do amazing camp activities !
This game is so much fun ! Let's be the best scout of the camping !

These kids need your help ! Choose among a lot of levels and let the fun begin!
Complete all the levels and all summer camping activities !
Play the role of a adventurous kid, there are lot of different activities !
Can you help him and friends during the camp ?

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination
in the world of camping.

Camping Vacation Kids is simple and fun :
* Open the game and choose the level
* pitch a tent in a beautiful place
* find all your favorite hidden animals
* treat the injured boy, be a doctor !
* dress up the boy / girl
* play bullseye/dart game
* catch all the butterflies
* light the campfire and prepare the food near the bonfire
* play clay shooting
* go kayaking and other amazing camp activities
* coloring book: camping coloring pages

Today we need to start the kids summer camp, and a lot of activities need to be done.
Can you help this adorable girl in this adorable game ?
If your toddler loves to play with summer camp games this is the best game for your child.

Camping Vacation Kids is a must have app for kids. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 2-13 years old, suitable for the whole family
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-a lot of different camp games and activities that toddlers can learn
-challenging tasks and adventures
-build a tent to sleep
-make a bonfire and then cook your favorite food
-coloring pages for extra fun
-fun adventures in the wild
-explore nature and the outdoors
-enjoy summer vacation before going back to school !

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination in this camping game !
Play with the best camp game for kids, become the best scout in the world!
The kids need your help in this camp ! Run the coolest camping in the city !

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developers: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
